item.title: Jimmy Carter Was No Kamala Harris on Life
item.description: How far the Democrats have fallen.

item.title: A Late Biden Assault on Offshore Drilling Would Be Reckless
item.description: Worse, we don’t know to what extent the president himself would even be making the decision.

item.title: Don’t Force the Ten Commandments Out of the Classroom
item.description: Contrary to the ACLU’s case against a new Louisiana law, a mountain of robust historical evidence supports the display of the Decalogue in schools.

item.title: Joe Biden Is Weakening American Energy Production on His Way Out of Office
item.description: The departing president’s latest restrictions on drilling and development are designed to placate environmentalists and undermine Trump’s energy agend...

item.title: How Social Conservatives Can Make the Most of a Second Trump Administration
item.description: The next four years will present significant opportunities for social conservatives to catalyze a moral and cultural renaissance.
